content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":254812,"originalJapaneseLine":"それに、魔剣カオスを持つ危険な男の側になんか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Besides, I don't want to be near a dangerous man wielding the Demon Sword Chaos..."},{"lineNumber":254813,"originalJapaneseLine":"ん・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm..."},{"lineNumber":254814,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょっと考える火炎司書","translatedEnglishLine":"The Flame Librarian thinks for a moment."},{"lineNumber":254815,"originalJapaneseLine":"もしかして、カオスを持つこの人間、それにサテラも居るし","translatedEnglishLine":"Could it be that this person who has Chaos... and Satella is here too?"},{"lineNumber":254816,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、まさかね・・","translatedEnglishLine":"No, that can't be..."},{"lineNumber":254817,"originalJapaneseLine":"でも・・ケイブリス陣営にいてもハウゼル様の身を守るのが難しくなってきた","translatedEnglishLine":"But... even staying with the Cavebris faction, it has become difficult to protect Lord Howzell."},{"lineNumber":254818,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスはともかく、カミーラやメディウサ（フラグ　存在確認が必要）は","translatedEnglishLine":"Setting Cavebris aside, Camilla and Medusa (a flag; their presence needs confirmation)..."},{"lineNumber":254819,"originalJapaneseLine":"いずれハウゼル様に手を出してきそう・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Will probably make a move against Lord Howzell sooner or later..."},{"lineNumber":254820,"originalJapaneseLine":"なら、いっそ・・かけてみるか","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, might as well... take a chance."},{"lineNumber":254821,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、そうね。ケイブリス側にはハウゼル様は負けて捕まったと報告するわ","translatedEnglishLine":"No, that's right. I'll report to the Cavebris side that Lord Howzell lost and was captured."},{"lineNumber":254822,"originalJapaneseLine":"今更のこのこ戻っても殺されるだけだしね、下手すりゃそのせいでホーネット様の","translatedEnglishLine":"Coming back now would just get me killed, and if things go badly, it might endanger Lady Hornet as well."},{"lineNumber":254823,"originalJapaneseLine":"身も危ないかも、ここに捕まった事にしておいた方がいい","translatedEnglishLine":"Her life might be in danger too; it's better to say I was captured here."},{"lineNumber":254824,"originalJapaneseLine":"おとなしくしてなさい","translatedEnglishLine":"Behave yourself."},{"lineNumber":254825,"originalJapaneseLine":"と言って立ち去る","translatedEnglishLine":"Saying that, she leaves."},{"lineNumber":254826,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・置いていかれてしまった、でも本があるからいいとハウゼル","translatedEnglishLine":"...I've been left behind, but it's fine because I have the book, thought Howzell."},{"lineNumber":254827,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラ、あんたね、とにかくホーネット様の事を聞かせて","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella, you... anyway, tell me about Lady Hornet."},{"lineNumber":254828,"originalJapaneseLine":"うん","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah."},{"lineNumber":254829,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＞勝利","translatedEnglishLine":"\t\t>Victory"},{"lineNumber":254830,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t甲冑付きのシルキィを力技で倒す","translatedEnglishLine":"\t\tDefeated armored Silky with brute strength."},{"lineNumber":254831,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこの方面の魔軍は総崩れ","translatedEnglishLine":"\t\tThe demon army in this area is completely broken."},{"lineNumber":254832,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tリーザス軍、野営地","translatedEnglishLine":"\t\tLeazas Army, Camp."},{"lineNumber":254833,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tサテラの説得でシルキィがおとなくなった","translatedEnglishLine":"\t\tSilky calmed down due to Satella's persuasion."},{"lineNumber":254834,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tまだ手は出せないが、手元にあるのでじっくりチャンスを見て犯そう","translatedEnglishLine":"\t\tCan't make a move yet, but since she's in our hands, let's wait patiently for a chance to defile her."},{"lineNumber":254835,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t俺様が優秀過ぎるので予定より早くミッション完了したが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\t\tI was too skilled, so I finished the mission earlier than scheduled,"},{"lineNumber":254836,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこの勢いで一気にもう一人の魔人ハウゼルを倒すか、それとも帰るか考えている","translatedEnglishLine":"\t\tThinking whether to take down the other demon, Howzell, now with this momentum, or to return."},{"lineNumber":254837,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tリア、マリスにあいにくと情報が入っていた","translatedEnglishLine":"\t\tUnfortunately, Ria and Maris received some information."},{"lineNumber":254838,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tもうひとりの魔人レキシントンが現れている","translatedEnglishLine":"\t\tAnother demon, Lexington, has appeared."},{"lineNumber":254839,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tサテラ、女の鬼？？","translatedEnglishLine":"\t\tSatella, a female demon??"},{"lineNumber":254840,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":"\t\t>Choice"},{"lineNumber":254841,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＞　リアと遊んだ後、ランス城に戻る","translatedEnglishLine":"\t\t> After playing with Ria, return to Rance Castle."},{"lineNumber":254842,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＞　このまま連続で魔人を倒す","translatedEnglishLine":"\t\t> Continue to defeat demon lords consecutively."},{"lineNumber":254843,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tま、戦いはリーザス軍に任せて","translatedEnglishLine":"\t\tWell, leave the fighting to the Leazas army."},{"lineNumber":254844,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t今日はリアと遊んで、明日帰る事にした","translatedEnglishLine":"\t\tDecided to play with Ria today and return tomorrow."},{"lineNumber":254845,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＜クリア＞","translatedEnglishLine":"\t\t<Clear>"},{"lineNumber":254846,"originalJapaneseLine":"レキシントンを倒す事を決意","translatedEnglishLine":"Decided to defeat Lexington."},{"lineNumber":254847,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は、公園坂森の入り口に来ていた","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others arrived at the entrance of Park Hill Forest."},{"lineNumber":254848,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かが戦況の説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone explains the battle situation."},{"lineNumber":254849,"originalJapaneseLine":"地図：リーザス１／合戦１−５","translatedEnglishLine":"Map: Leazas 1 / Battle 1-5"},{"lineNumber":254850,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍敗走で我が軍の追撃、ガマック周辺まで取り返しました。","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army retreated; our forces pursued and retook the area around Gamack."},{"lineNumber":254851,"originalJapaneseLine":"また南国軍もＬＣＭ連山の峡谷を抜けて進撃","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, the Southern army advanced through the LCM Renzan Gorge."},{"lineNumber":254852,"originalJapaneseLine":"これにより魔軍は大混乱","translatedEnglishLine":"This caused great confusion among the demon army."},{"lineNumber":254853,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこに魔人レキシントンが現れ、一時的に押し返されましたが","translatedEnglishLine":"Then demon lord Lexington appeared, temporarily pushing us back,"},{"lineNumber":254854,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかしバレス殿の作戦で罠にかける事に成功、敗走させたとの事です","translatedEnglishLine":"But thanks to Lord Bales's strategy, they succeeded in trapping him, forcing a retreat."},{"lineNumber":254855,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人のくせに弱いみたいだな","translatedEnglishLine":"Though a demon lord, he seems weak."},{"lineNumber":254856,"originalJapaneseLine":"今は、ガマック南方のこの公園坂森に追い込んだとの事です","translatedEnglishLine":"Currently, he has been cornered here in Park Hill Forest south of Gamack."},{"lineNumber":254857,"originalJapaneseLine":"レキシントンとアトランタが居る","translatedEnglishLine":"Lexington and Atlanta are present."},{"lineNumber":254858,"originalJapaneseLine":"まさか、偽者の魂とは・・申し訳ございません、気が付かずに","translatedEnglishLine":"No way, a fake soul... I apologize for not noticing."},{"lineNumber":254859,"originalJapaneseLine":"もうよい、小娘の魂は完全に消えた。もうわしは復活した。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's fine now. The young girl's soul has completely disappeared. I have revived."},{"lineNumber":254860,"originalJapaneseLine":"馬鹿な小娘のせいで押されているようだが、ここまでだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems we've been pushed back because of that foolish girl, but this is the end."},{"lineNumber":254861,"originalJapaneseLine":"今から、わしの恐ろしさを人間共に思い知らせてやる","translatedEnglishLine":"From now on, I'll make these humans recognize my terror."},{"lineNumber":254862,"originalJapaneseLine":"はい、お供しますとアトランタとジュノー","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, we'll accompany you, said Atlanta and Juno."},{"lineNumber":254863,"originalJapaneseLine":"　メモ","translatedEnglishLine":"Note:"},{"lineNumber":254864,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　なんらかの出来事があり、ニミッツの魂は消えいます","translatedEnglishLine":"Due to some event, Nimitz's soul has disappeared."},{"lineNumber":254865,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　場所　公園坂森","translatedEnglishLine":"Location: Park Hill Forest."},{"lineNumber":254866,"originalJapaneseLine":"背景：森","translatedEnglishLine":"Background: Forest."},{"lineNumber":254867,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達がレキシントンと遭遇。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others encounter Lexington."},{"lineNumber":254868,"originalJapaneseLine":"おっ、今度はでかい系の女魔人か、いいねーこういうのも犯しがいがある","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, this time it's a big-type female demon lord, huh? Nice — these are just as worth violating."},{"lineNumber":254869,"originalJapaneseLine":"レキシントンは中身、おっさんなので完全におっさん対応","translatedEnglishLine":"Lexington is actually an old man inside, so handle him fully like an old man."},{"lineNumber":254870,"originalJapaneseLine":"アトランタ、ジュノーも一緒に戦います","translatedEnglishLine":"Atlanta and Juno will fight alongside."},{"lineNumber":254871,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに、魔剣カオスを持つ危険な男の側になんか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, I don't want to be near a dangerous man wielding the Demon Sword Chaos...
Hmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと考える火炎司書
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Flame Librarian thinks for a moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしかして、カオスを持つこの人間、それにサテラも居るし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be that this person who has Chaos... and Satella is here too?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、まさかね・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, that can't be...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも・・ケイブリス陣営にいてもハウゼル様の身を守るのが難しくなってきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But... even staying with the Cavebris faction, it has become difficult to protect Lord Howzell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスはともかく、カミーラやメディウサ（フラグ　存在確認が必要）は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Setting Cavebris aside, Camilla and Medusa (a flag; their presence needs confirmation)...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いずれハウゼル様に手を出してきそう・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Will probably make a move against Lord Howzell sooner or later...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら、いっそ・・かけてみるか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, might as well... take a chance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、そうね。ケイブリス側にはハウゼル様は負けて捕まったと報告するわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, that's right. I'll report to the Cavebris side that Lord Howzell lost and was captured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今更のこのこ戻っても殺されるだけだしね、下手すりゃそのせいでホーネット様の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Coming back now would just get me killed, and if things go badly, it might endanger Lady Hornet as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身も危ないかも、ここに捕まった事にしておいた方がいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her life might be in danger too; it's better to say I was captured here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おとなしくしてなさい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Behave yourself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と言って立ち去る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying that, she leaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・・置いていかれてしまった、でも本があるからいいとハウゼル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...I've been left behind, but it's fine because I have the book, thought Howzell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ、あんたね、とにかくホーネット様の事を聞かせて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella, you... anyway, tell me about Lady Hornet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞勝利
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: >Victory

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 甲冑付きのシルキィを力技で倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeated armored Silky with brute strength.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この方面の魔軍は総崩れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army in this area is completely broken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍、野営地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leazas Army, Camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラの説得でシルキィがおとなくなった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky calmed down due to Satella's persuasion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ手は出せないが、手元にあるのでじっくりチャンスを見て犯そう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can't make a move yet, but since she's in our hands, let's wait patiently for a chance to defile her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様が優秀過ぎるので予定より早くミッション完了したが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was too skilled, so I finished the mission earlier than scheduled,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この勢いで一気にもう一人の魔人ハウゼルを倒すか、それとも帰るか考えている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thinking whether to take down the other demon, Howzell, now with this momentum, or to return.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、マリスにあいにくと情報が入っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unfortunately, Ria and Maris received some information.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうひとりの魔人レキシントンが現れている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Another demon, Lexington, has appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ、女の鬼？？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella, a female demon??

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: >Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　リアと遊んだ後、ランス城に戻る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > After playing with Ria, return to Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　このまま連続で魔人を倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Continue to defeat demon lords consecutively.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、戦いはリーザス軍に任せて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, leave the fighting to the Leazas army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はリアと遊んで、明日帰る事にした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Decided to play with Ria today and return tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜クリア＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Clear>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントンを倒す事を決意
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Decided to defeat Lexington.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は、公園坂森の入り口に来ていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others arrived at the entrance of Park Hill Forest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが戦況の説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone explains the battle situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図：リーザス１／合戦１−５
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Map: Leazas 1 / Battle 1-5

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍敗走で我が軍の追撃、ガマック周辺まで取り返しました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army retreated; our forces pursued and retook the area around Gamack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また南国軍もＬＣＭ連山の峡谷を抜けて進撃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, the Southern army advanced through the LCM Renzan Gorge.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これにより魔軍は大混乱
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This caused great confusion among the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに魔人レキシントンが現れ、一時的に押し返されましたが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then demon lord Lexington appeared, temporarily pushing us back,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかしバレス殿の作戦で罠にかける事に成功、敗走させたとの事です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But thanks to Lord Bales's strategy, they succeeded in trapping him, forcing a retreat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人のくせに弱いみたいだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though a demon lord, he seems weak.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は、ガマック南方のこの公園坂森に追い込んだとの事です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Currently, he has been cornered here in Park Hill Forest south of Gamack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントンとアトランタが居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington and Atlanta are present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか、偽者の魂とは・・申し訳ございません、気が付かずに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way, a fake soul... I apologize for not noticing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうよい、小娘の魂は完全に消えた。もうわしは復活した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's fine now. The young girl's soul has completely disappeared. I have revived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 馬鹿な小娘のせいで押されているようだが、ここまでだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems we've been pushed back because of that foolish girl, but this is the end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今から、わしの恐ろしさを人間共に思い知らせてやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now on, I'll make these humans recognize my terror.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、お供しますとアトランタとジュノー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, we'll accompany you, said Atlanta and Juno.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メモ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Note:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんらかの出来事があり、ニミッツの魂は消えいます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to some event, Nimitz's soul has disappeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 場所　公園坂森
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Location: Park Hill Forest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：森
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Forest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がレキシントンと遭遇。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others encounter Lexington.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっ、今度はでかい系の女魔人か、いいねーこういうのも犯しがいがある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, this time it's a big-type female demon lord, huh? Nice — these are just as worth violating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントンは中身、おっさんなので完全におっさん対応
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington is actually an old man inside, so handle him fully like an old man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アトランタ、ジュノーも一緒に戦います
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Atlanta and Juno will fight alongside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Nice — these are just as worth violating."},{"lineNumber":254869,"originalJapaneseLine":"レキシントンは中身、おっさんなので完全におっさん対応","translatedEnglishLine":"Lexington is actually an old man inside, so handle him fully like an old man."},{"lineNumber":254870,"originalJapaneseLine":"アトランタ、ジュノーも一緒に戦います","translatedEnglishLine":"Atlanta and Juno will fight alongside."},{"lineNumber":254871,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに、魔剣カオスを持つ危険な男の側になんか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, I don't want to be near a dangerous man wielding the Demon Sword Chaos...
Hmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと考える火炎司書
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Flame Librarian thinks for a moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしかして、カオスを持つこの人間、それにサテラも居るし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be that this person who has Chaos... and Satella is here too?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、まさかね・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, that can't be...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも・・ケイブリス陣営にいてもハウゼル様の身を守るのが難しくなってきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But... even staying with the Cavebris faction, it has become difficult to protect Lord Howzell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスはともかく、カミーラやメディウサ（フラグ　存在確認が必要）は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Setting Cavebris aside, Camilla and Medusa (a flag; their presence needs confirmation)...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いずれハウゼル様に手を出してきそう・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Will probably make a move against Lord Howzell sooner or later...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら、いっそ・・かけてみるか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, might as well... take a chance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、そうね。ケイブリス側にはハウゼル様は負けて捕まったと報告するわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, that's right. I'll report to the Cavebris side that Lord Howzell lost and was captured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今更のこのこ戻っても殺されるだけだしね、下手すりゃそのせいでホーネット様の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Coming back now would just get me killed, and if things go badly, it might endanger Lady Hornet as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身も危ないかも、ここに捕まった事にしておいた方がいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her life might be in danger too; it's better to say I was captured here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おとなしくしてなさい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Behave yourself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と言って立ち去る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying that, she leaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・・置いていかれてしまった、でも本があるからいいとハウゼル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...I've been left behind, but it's fine because I have the book, thought Howzell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ、あんたね、とにかくホーネット様の事を聞かせて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella, you... anyway, tell me about Lady Hornet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞勝利
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: >Victory

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 甲冑付きのシルキィを力技で倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeated armored Silky with brute strength.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この方面の魔軍は総崩れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army in this area is completely broken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍、野営地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leazas Army, Camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラの説得でシルキィがおとなくなった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky calmed down due to Satella's persuasion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ手は出せないが、手元にあるのでじっくりチャンスを見て犯そう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can't make a move yet, but since she's in our hands, let's wait patiently for a chance to defile her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様が優秀過ぎるので予定より早くミッション完了したが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was too skilled, so I finished the mission earlier than scheduled,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この勢いで一気にもう一人の魔人ハウゼルを倒すか、それとも帰るか考えている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thinking whether to take down the other demon, Howzell, now with this momentum, or to return.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、マリスにあいにくと情報が入っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unfortunately, Ria and Maris received some information.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうひとりの魔人レキシントンが現れている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Another demon, Lexington, has appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ、女の鬼？？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella, a female demon??

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: >Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　リアと遊んだ後、ランス城に戻る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > After playing with Ria, return to Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　このまま連続で魔人を倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Continue to defeat demon lords consecutively.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、戦いはリーザス軍に任せて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, leave the fighting to the Leazas army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はリアと遊んで、明日帰る事にした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Decided to play with Ria today and return tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜クリア＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Clear>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントンを倒す事を決意
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Decided to defeat Lexington.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は、公園坂森の入り口に来ていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others arrived at the entrance of Park Hill Forest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが戦況の説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone explains the battle situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図：リーザス１／合戦１−５
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Map: Leazas 1 / Battle 1-5

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍敗走で我が軍の追撃、ガマック周辺まで取り返しました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army retreated; our forces pursued and retook the area around Gamack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また南国軍もＬＣＭ連山の峡谷を抜けて進撃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, the Southern army advanced through the LCM Renzan Gorge.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これにより魔軍は大混乱
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This caused great confusion among the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに魔人レキシントンが現れ、一時的に押し返されましたが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then demon lord Lexington appeared, temporarily pushing us back,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかしバレス殿の作戦で罠にかける事に成功、敗走させたとの事です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But thanks to Lord Bales's strategy, they succeeded in trapping him, forcing a retreat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人のくせに弱いみたいだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though a demon lord, he seems weak.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は、ガマック南方のこの公園坂森に追い込んだとの事です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Currently, he has been cornered here in Park Hill Forest south of Gamack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントンとアトランタが居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington and Atlanta are present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか、偽者の魂とは・・申し訳ございません、気が付かずに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way, a fake soul... I apologize for not noticing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうよい、小娘の魂は完全に消えた。もうわしは復活した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's fine now. The young girl's soul has completely disappeared. I have revived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 馬鹿な小娘のせいで押されているようだが、ここまでだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems we've been pushed back because of that foolish girl, but this is the end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今から、わしの恐ろしさを人間共に思い知らせてやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now on, I'll make these humans recognize my terror.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、お供しますとアトランタとジュノー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, we'll accompany you, said Atlanta and Juno.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メモ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Note:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんらかの出来事があり、ニミッツの魂は消えいます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to some event, Nimitz's soul has disappeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 場所　公園坂森
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Location: Park Hill Forest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：森
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Forest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がレキシントンと遭遇。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others encounter Lexington.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっ、今度はでかい系の女魔人か、いいねーこういうのも犯しがいがある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, this time it's a big-type female demon lord, huh? Nice — these are just as worth violating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントンは中身、おっさんなので完全におっさん対応
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington is actually an old man inside, so handle him fully like an old man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アトランタ、ジュノーも一緒に戦います
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Atlanta and Juno will fight alongside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle
